20static void InsertExtensionString(const std::string &extension,
21 bool supported,
22 std::vector<std::string> *extensionVector)
23{
24 if (supported)
25 {
26 extensionVector->push_back(extension);
27 }
28}
29
30namespace gl
31{
32
33TextureCaps::TextureCaps() = default;
34
35TextureCaps::TextureCaps(const TextureCaps &other) = default;
36
37TextureCaps::~TextureCaps() = default;
38
39GLuint TextureCaps::getMaxSamples() const
40{
41 return !sampleCounts.empty() ? *sampleCounts.rbegin() : 0;
42}
43
44GLuint TextureCaps::getNearestSamples(GLuint requestedSamples) const
45{
46 if (requestedSamples == 0)
47 {
48 return 0;
49 }
50
51 for (SupportedSampleSet::const_iterator i = sampleCounts.begin(); i != sampleCounts.end(); i++)
52 {
53 GLuint samples = *i;
54 if (samples >= requestedSamples)
55 {
56 return samples;
57 }
58 }
59
60 return 0;
61}
62
63TextureCaps GenerateMinimumTextureCaps(GLenum sizedInternalFormat,
64 const Version &clientVersion,
65 const Extensions &extensions)
66{
67 TextureCaps caps;
68
69 const InternalFormat &internalFormatInfo = GetSizedInternalFormatInfo(sizedInternalFormat);
70 caps.texturable = internalFormatInfo.textureSupport(clientVersion, extensions);
71 caps.filterable = internalFormatInfo.filterSupport(clientVersion, extensions);
72 caps.textureAttachment = internalFormatInfo.textureAttachmentSupport(clientVersion, extensions);
73 caps.renderbuffer = internalFormatInfo.renderbufferSupport(clientVersion, extensions);
74 caps.blendable = internalFormatInfo.blendSupport(clientVersion, extensions);
75
76 caps.sampleCounts.insert(0);
77 if (internalFormatInfo.isRequiredRenderbufferFormat(clientVersion))
78 {
79 if ((clientVersion.major >= 3 && clientVersion.minor >= 1) ||
80 (clientVersion.major >= 3 && !internalFormatInfo.isInt()))
81 {
82 caps.sampleCounts.insert(4);
83 }
84 }
85
86 return caps;
87}
88
89TextureCapsMap::TextureCapsMap() {}
90
91TextureCapsMap::~TextureCapsMap() {}
92
93void TextureCapsMap::insert(GLenum internalFormat, const TextureCaps &caps)
94{
95 angle::FormatID formatID = angle::Format::InternalFormatToID(internalFormat);
96 get(formatID) = caps;
97}
98
99void TextureCapsMap::clear()
100{
101 mFormatData.fill(TextureCaps());
102}
103
104const TextureCaps &TextureCapsMap::get(GLenum internalFormat) const
105{
106 angle::FormatID formatID = angle::Format::InternalFormatToID(internalFormat);
107 return get(formatID);
108}
109
110const TextureCaps &TextureCapsMap::get(angle::FormatID formatID) const
111{
112 return mFormatData[static_cast<size_t>(formatID)];
113}
114
115TextureCaps &TextureCapsMap::get(angle::FormatID formatID)
116{
117 return mFormatData[static_cast<size_t>(formatID)];
118}
119
120void TextureCapsMap::set(angle::FormatID formatID, const TextureCaps &caps)
121{
122 get(formatID) = caps;
123}
124
125void InitMinimumTextureCapsMap(const Version &clientVersion,
126 const Extensions &extensions,
127 TextureCapsMap *capsMap)
128{
129 for (GLenum internalFormat : GetAllSizedInternalFormats())
130 {
131 capsMap->insert(internalFormat,
132 GenerateMinimumTextureCaps(internalFormat, clientVersion, extensions));
133 }
134}
135
136Extensions::Extensions() = default;
137
138Extensions::Extensions(const Extensions &other) = default;
139
140Extensions &Extensions::operator=(const Extensions &other) = default;
141
142std::vector<std::string> Extensions::getStrings() const
143{
144 std::vector<std::string> extensionStrings;
145
146 for (const auto &extensionInfo : GetExtensionInfoMap())
147 {
148 if (this->*(extensionInfo.second.ExtensionsMember))
149 {
150 extensionStrings.push_back(extensionInfo.first);
151 }
152 }
153
154 return extensionStrings;
155}

157Limitations::Limitations() = default;
158Limitations::Limitations(const Limitations &other) = default;
159
160Limitations &Limitations::operator=(const Limitations &other) = default;
161
162static bool GetFormatSupportBase(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps,
163 const GLenum *requiredFormats,
164 size_t requiredFormatsSize,
165 bool requiresTexturing,
166 bool requiresFiltering,
167 bool requiresAttachingTexture,
168 bool requiresRenderbufferSupport,
169 bool requiresBlending)
170{
171 for (size_t i = 0; i < requiredFormatsSize; i++)
172 {
173 const TextureCaps &cap = textureCaps.get(requiredFormats[i]);
174 if (requiresTexturing && !cap.texturable)
175 {
176 return false;
177 }
178
179 if (requiresFiltering && !cap.filterable)
180 {
181 return false;
182 }
183
184 if (requiresAttachingTexture && !cap.textureAttachment)
185 {
186 return false;
187 }
188
189 if (requiresRenderbufferSupport && !cap.renderbuffer)
190 {
191 return false;
192 }
193
194 if (requiresBlending && !cap.blendable)
195 {
196 return false;
197 }
198 }
199
200 return true;
201}
202
203template <size_t N>
204static bool GetFormatSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps,
205 const GLenum (&requiredFormats)[N],
206 bool requiresTexturing,
207 bool requiresFiltering,
208 bool requiresAttachingTexture,
209 bool requiresRenderbufferSupport,
210 bool requiresBlending)
211{
212 return GetFormatSupportBase(textureCaps, requiredFormats, N, requiresTexturing,
213 requiresFiltering, requiresAttachingTexture,
214 requiresRenderbufferSupport, requiresBlending);
215}
216
217// Check for GL_OES_packed_depth_stencil support
218static bool DeterminePackedDepthStencilSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
219{
220 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
221 GL_DEPTH24_STENCIL8,
222 };
223
224 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, false, true, true, false);
225}

229{
230 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
231 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT16,
232 };
233
234 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, true, false, false);
235}

279// Checks for GL_EXT_read_format_bgra support
280static bool DetermineBGRAReadFormatSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
281{
282 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
283 GL_BGRA8_EXT,
284 // TODO(http://anglebug.com/4302): GL_EXT_read_format_bgra specifies 2 more types, which are
285 // currently ignored. The equivalent formats would be: GL_BGRA4_ANGLEX, GL_BGR5_A1_ANGLEX
286 };
287
288 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, true, true, false);
289}
290
291// Checks for GL_OES_color_buffer_half_float support
292static bool DetermineColorBufferHalfFloatSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
293{
294 // EXT_color_buffer_half_float issue #2 states that an implementation doesn't need to support
295 // rendering to any of the formats but is expected to be able to render to at least one. WebGL
296 // requires that at least RGBA16F is renderable so we make the same requirement.
297 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
298 GL_RGBA16F,
299 };
300
301 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, false, true, true, false);
302}
303
304// Checks for GL_OES_texture_half_float support
305static bool DetermineHalfFloatTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
306{
307 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
308 GL_RGBA16F, GL_RGB16F, GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA16F_EXT, GL_LUMINANCE16F_EXT, GL_ALPHA16F_EXT,
309 };
310
311 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, false, false, false);
312}
313
314// Checks for GL_OES_texture_half_float_linear support
315static bool DetermineHalfFloatTextureFilteringSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps,
316 bool checkLegacyFormats)
317{
318 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {GL_RGBA16F, GL_RGB16F};
319 // If GL_OES_texture_half_float is present, this extension must also support legacy formats
320 // introduced by that extension
321 constexpr GLenum requiredFormatsES2[] = {GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA16F_EXT, GL_LUMINANCE16F_EXT,
322 GL_ALPHA16F_EXT};
323
324 if (checkLegacyFormats &&
325 !GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormatsES2, false, true, false, false, false))
326 {
327 return false;
328 }
329
330 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, true, false, false, false);
331}
332
333// Checks for GL_OES_texture_float support
334static bool DetermineFloatTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
335{
336 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
337 GL_RGBA32F, GL_RGB32F, GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA32F_EXT, GL_LUMINANCE32F_EXT, GL_ALPHA32F_EXT,
338 };
339
340 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, false, false, false);
341}
342
343// Checks for GL_OES_texture_float_linear support
344static bool DetermineFloatTextureFilteringSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps,
345 bool checkLegacyFormats)
346{
347 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
348 GL_RGBA32F,
349 GL_RGB32F,
350 };
351 // If GL_OES_texture_float is present, this extension must also support legacy formats
352 // introduced by that extension
353 constexpr GLenum requiredFormatsES2[] = {
354 GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA32F_EXT,
355 GL_LUMINANCE32F_EXT,
356 GL_ALPHA32F_EXT,
357 };
358
359 if (checkLegacyFormats &&
360 !GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormatsES2, false, true, false, false, false))
361 {
362 return false;
363 }
364
365 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, true, false, false, false);
366}
367
368// Checks for GL_EXT_texture_rg support
369static bool DetermineRGTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps,
370 bool checkHalfFloatFormats,
371 bool checkFloatFormats)
372{
373 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
374 GL_R8,
375 GL_RG8,
376 };
377 constexpr GLenum requiredHalfFloatFormats[] = {
378 GL_R16F,
379 GL_RG16F,
380 };
381 constexpr GLenum requiredFloatFormats[] = {
382 GL_R32F,
383 GL_RG32F,
384 };
385
386 if (checkHalfFloatFormats &&
387 !GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredHalfFloatFormats, true, false, false, false, false))
388 {
389 return false;
390 }
391
392 if (checkFloatFormats &&
393 !GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFloatFormats, true, false, false, false, false))
394 {
395 return false;
396 }
397
398 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, true, true, false);
399}

445// Check for GL_KHR_texture_compression_astc_ldr support
446static bool DetermineASTCLDRTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
447{
448 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
449 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_4x4_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_5x4_KHR,
450 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_5x5_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_6x5_KHR,
451 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_6x6_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_8x5_KHR,
452 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_8x6_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_8x8_KHR,
453 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_10x5_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_10x6_KHR,
454 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_10x8_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_10x10_KHR,
455 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_12x10_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_12x12_KHR,
456 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_4x4_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_5x4_KHR,
457 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_5x5_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_6x5_KHR,
458 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_6x6_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_8x5_KHR,
459 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_8x6_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_8x8_KHR,
460 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_10x5_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_10x6_KHR,
461 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_10x8_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_10x10_KHR,
462 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_12x10_KHR, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_12x12_KHR,
463 };
464
465 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
466}
467
468// Check for GL_OES_texture_compression_astc support
469static bool DetermineASTCOESTExtureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
470{
471 if (!DetermineASTCLDRTextureSupport(textureCaps))
472 {
473 return false;
474 }
475
476 // The OES version of the extension also requires the 3D ASTC formats
477 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
478 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_3x3x3_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_4x3x3_OES,
479 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_4x4x3_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_4x4x4_OES,
480 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_5x4x4_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_5x5x4_OES,
481 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_5x5x5_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_6x5x5_OES,
482 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_6x6x5_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_ASTC_6x6x6_OES,
483 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_3x3x3_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_4x3x3_OES,
484 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_4x4x3_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_4x4x4_OES,
485 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_5x4x4_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_5x5x4_OES,
486 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_5x5x5_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_6x5x5_OES,
487 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_6x6x5_OES, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ASTC_6x6x6_OES,
488 };
489
490 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
491}

603// Check for GL_EXT_sRGB support
604static bool DetermineSRGBTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
605{
606 constexpr GLenum requiredFilterFormats[] = {
607 GL_SRGB8,
608 GL_SRGB8_ALPHA8,
609 };
610
611 constexpr GLenum requiredRenderFormats[] = {
612 GL_SRGB8_ALPHA8,
613 };
614
615 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFilterFormats, true, true, false, false, false) &&
616 GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredRenderFormats, true, false, true, true, false);
617}
618

620static bool DetermineSRGBR8TextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
621{
622 constexpr GLenum requiredFilterFormats[] = {GL_SR8_EXT};
623
624 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFilterFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
625}
626
627// Check for GL_ANGLE_depth_texture support
628static bool DetermineDepthTextureANGLESupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
629{
630 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
631 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT16,
632#if !defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_IOS) && (!defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_MACCATALYST) || !defined(ANGLE_CPU_ARM64))
633 // TODO(dino): Temporarily Removing the need for GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT32_OES
634 // because it is not supported on iOS.
635 // TODO(dino): I think this needs to be a runtime check when running an iOS app on Mac.
636 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT32_OES,
637#endif
638 GL_DEPTH24_STENCIL8_OES,
639 };
640
641 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, true, false, false);
642}
643
644// Check for GL_OES_depth_texture support
645static bool DetermineDepthTextureOESSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
646{
647 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
648 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT16,
649#if !defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_IOS) && (!defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_MACCATALYST) || !defined(ANGLE_CPU_ARM64))
650 // TODO(dino): Temporarily Removing the need for GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT32_OES
651 // because it is not supported on iOS.
652 // TODO(dino): I think this needs to be a runtime check when running an iOS app on Mac.
653 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT32_OES,
654#endif
655 };
656
657 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, true, true, false);
658}
659
660// Check for GL_OES_depth24
661static bool DetermineDepth24OESSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
662{
663 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
664 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24_OES,
665 };
666
667 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, false, false, true, false);
668}
669
670// Check for GL_OES_depth32 support
671static bool DetermineDepth32Support(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
672{
673 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
674 GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT32_OES,
675 };
676
677 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, false, true, true, false);
678}
679
680// Check for GL_CHROMIUM_color_buffer_float_rgb support
681static bool DetermineColorBufferFloatRGBSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
682{
683 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
684 GL_RGB32F,
685 };
686
687 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, true, false, false);
688}
689
690// Check for GL_CHROMIUM_color_buffer_float_rgba support
691static bool DetermineColorBufferFloatRGBASupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
692{
693 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
694 GL_RGBA32F,
695 };
696
697 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, true, true, false);
698}
699
700// Check for GL_EXT_color_buffer_float support
701static bool DetermineColorBufferFloatSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
702{
703 constexpr GLenum nonBlendableFormats[] = {
704 GL_R32F,
705 GL_RG32F,
706 GL_RGBA32F,
707 };
708
709 constexpr GLenum blendableFormats[] = {
710 GL_R16F,
711 GL_RG16F,
712 GL_RGBA16F,
713 GL_R11F_G11F_B10F,
714 };
715
716 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, nonBlendableFormats, true, false, true, true, false) &&
717 GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, blendableFormats, true, false, true, true, true);
718}
719
720// Check for GL_EXT_float_blend support
721static bool DetermineFloatBlendSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
722{
723 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
724 GL_R32F,
725 GL_RG32F,
726 GL_RGBA32F,
727 };
728
729 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, false, true, true, true);
730}
731
732// Check for GL_EXT_texture_norm16 support
733static bool DetermineTextureNorm16Support(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
734{
735 constexpr GLenum requiredFilterFormats[] = {
736 GL_R16_EXT, GL_RG16_EXT, GL_RGB16_EXT, GL_RGBA16_EXT,
737 GL_R16_SNORM_EXT, GL_RG16_SNORM_EXT, GL_RGB16_SNORM_EXT, GL_RGBA16_SNORM_EXT,
738 };
739
740 constexpr GLenum requiredRenderFormats[] = {
741 GL_R16_EXT,
742 GL_RG16_EXT,
743 GL_RGBA16_EXT,
744 };
745
746 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFilterFormats, true, true, false, false, false) &&
747 GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredRenderFormats, true, false, true, true, false);
748}
749
750// Check for EXT_texture_compression_rgtc support
751static bool DetermineRGTCTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
752{
753 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
754 GL_COMPRESSED_RED_RGTC1_EXT, GL_COMPRESSED_SIGNED_RED_RGTC1_EXT,
755 GL_COMPRESSED_RED_GREEN_RGTC2_EXT, GL_COMPRESSED_SIGNED_RED_GREEN_RGTC2_EXT};
756
757 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
758}
759
760// Check for EXT_texture_compression_bptc support
761static bool DetermineBPTCTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
762{
763 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
764 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_BPTC_UNORM_EXT, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB_ALPHA_BPTC_UNORM_EXT,
765 GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_BPTC_SIGNED_FLOAT_EXT, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_BPTC_UNSIGNED_FLOAT_EXT};
766
767 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
768}
769
770// Check for GL_IMG_texture_compression_pvrtc support
771static bool DeterminePVRTCTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
772{
773 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
774 GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_PVRTC_4BPPV1_IMG, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_PVRTC_2BPPV1_IMG,
775 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_PVRTC_4BPPV1_IMG, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_PVRTC_2BPPV1_IMG};
776
777 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
778}
779
780// Check for GL_EXT_pvrtc_sRGB support
781static bool DeterminePVRTCsRGBTextureSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
782{
783 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
784 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB_PVRTC_2BPPV1_EXT, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB_PVRTC_4BPPV1_EXT,
785 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB_ALPHA_PVRTC_2BPPV1_EXT, GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB_ALPHA_PVRTC_4BPPV1_EXT};
786
787 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
788}
789
790bool DetermineCompressedTextureETCSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
791{
792 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {GL_COMPRESSED_R11_EAC,
793 GL_COMPRESSED_SIGNED_R11_EAC,
794 GL_COMPRESSED_RG11_EAC,
795 GL_COMPRESSED_SIGNED_RG11_EAC,
796 GL_COMPRESSED_RGB8_ETC2,
797 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ETC2,
798 GL_COMPRESSED_RGB8_PUNCHTHROUGH_ALPHA1_ETC2,
799 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_PUNCHTHROUGH_ALPHA1_ETC2,
800 GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA8_ETC2_EAC,
801 GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ETC2_EAC};
802
803 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, true, true, false, false, false);
804}
805
806// Checks for GL_OES_texture_stencil8 support
807static bool DetermineStencilIndex8Support(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
808{
809 constexpr GLenum requiredFormats[] = {
810 GL_STENCIL_INDEX8,
811 };
812
813 return GetFormatSupport(textureCaps, requiredFormats, false, false, true, false, false);
814}
815
816void Extensions::setTextureExtensionSupport(const TextureCapsMap &textureCaps)
817{
818 // TODO(ynovikov): rgb8rgba8OES, colorBufferHalfFloat, textureHalfFloat, textureHalfFloatLinear,
819 // textureFloatOES, textureFloatLinearOES, textureRG, sRGB, colorBufferFloatRGB,
820 // colorBufferFloatRGBA and colorBufferFloat were verified. Verify the rest.
821 packedDepthStencilOES = DeterminePackedDepthStencilSupport(textureCaps);
822 rgb8rgba8OES = DetermineRGB8AndRGBA8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
823 readDepthNV = DetermineReadDepthSupport(textureCaps);
824 readStencilNV = DetermineReadStencilSupport(textureCaps);
825 depthBufferFloat2NV = DetermineDepthBufferFloat2Support(textureCaps);
826 textureFormatBGRA8888 = DetermineBGRA8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
827 readFormatBGRA = DetermineBGRAReadFormatSupport(textureCaps);
828 textureHalfFloat = DetermineHalfFloatTextureSupport(textureCaps);
829 textureHalfFloatLinear =
830 DetermineHalfFloatTextureFilteringSupport(textureCaps, textureHalfFloat);
831 textureFloatOES = DetermineFloatTextureSupport(textureCaps);
832 textureFloatLinearOES = DetermineFloatTextureFilteringSupport(textureCaps, textureFloatOES);
833 textureRG = DetermineRGTextureSupport(textureCaps, textureHalfFloat, textureFloatOES);
834 colorBufferHalfFloat = textureHalfFloat && DetermineColorBufferHalfFloatSupport(textureCaps);
835 textureCompressionDXT1 = DetermineDXT1TextureSupport(textureCaps);
836 textureCompressionDXT3 = DetermineDXT3TextureSupport(textureCaps);
837 textureCompressionDXT5 = DetermineDXT5TextureSupport(textureCaps);
838 textureCompressionS3TCsRGB = DetermineS3TCsRGBTextureSupport(textureCaps);
839 textureCompressionASTCLDRKHR = DetermineASTCLDRTextureSupport(textureCaps);
840 textureCompressionASTCOES = DetermineASTCOESTExtureSupport(textureCaps);
841 compressedETC1RGB8TextureOES = DetermineETC1RGB8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
842 compressedETC2RGB8TextureOES = DetermineETC2RGB8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
843 compressedETC2sRGB8TextureOES = DetermineETC2sRGB8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
844 compressedETC2PunchthroughARGB8TextureOES =
845 DetermineETC2PunchthroughARGB8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
846 compressedETC2PunchthroughAsRGB8AlphaTextureOES =
847 DetermineETC2PunchthroughAsRGB8AlphaTextureSupport(textureCaps);
848 compressedETC2RGBA8TextureOES = DetermineETC2RGBA8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
849 compressedETC2sRGB8Alpha8TextureOES = DetermineETC2sRGB8Alpha8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
850 compressedEACR11UnsignedTextureOES = DetermineEACR11UnsignedTextureSupport(textureCaps);
851 compressedEACR11SignedTextureOES = DetermineEACR11SignedTextureSupport(textureCaps);
852 compressedEACRG11UnsignedTextureOES = DetermineEACRG11UnsignedTextureSupport(textureCaps);
853 compressedEACRG11SignedTextureOES = DetermineEACRG11SignedTextureSupport(textureCaps);
854 sRGB = DetermineSRGBTextureSupport(textureCaps);
855 sRGBR8EXT = DetermineSRGBR8TextureSupport(textureCaps);
856 depthTextureANGLE = DetermineDepthTextureANGLESupport(textureCaps);
857 depthTextureOES = DetermineDepthTextureOESSupport(textureCaps);
858 depth24OES = DetermineDepth24OESSupport(textureCaps);
859 depth32OES = DetermineDepth32Support(textureCaps);
860 colorBufferFloatRGB = DetermineColorBufferFloatRGBSupport(textureCaps);
861 colorBufferFloatRGBA = DetermineColorBufferFloatRGBASupport(textureCaps);
862 colorBufferFloat = DetermineColorBufferFloatSupport(textureCaps);
863 floatBlend = DetermineFloatBlendSupport(textureCaps);
864 textureNorm16 = DetermineTextureNorm16Support(textureCaps);
865 textureCompressionRGTC = DetermineRGTCTextureSupport(textureCaps);
866 textureCompressionBPTC = DetermineBPTCTextureSupport(textureCaps);
867 compressedTexturePVRTC = DeterminePVRTCTextureSupport(textureCaps);
868 compressedTexturePVRTCsRGB = DeterminePVRTCsRGBTextureSupport(textureCaps);
869 stencilIndex8 = DetermineStencilIndex8Support(textureCaps);
870}
871
872const ExtensionInfoMap &GetExtensionInfoMap()
873{
874 auto buildExtensionInfoMap = []() {
875 auto enableableExtension = [](ExtensionBool member) {
876 ExtensionInfo info;
877 info.Requestable = true;
878 info.ExtensionsMember = member;
879 return info;
880 };
881
882 auto enableableDisablableExtension = [&](ExtensionBool member) {
883 ExtensionInfo info = enableableExtension(member);
884 info.Disablable = true;
885 return info;
886 };
887
888 auto esOnlyExtension = [](ExtensionBool member) {
889 ExtensionInfo info;
890 info.ExtensionsMember = member;
891 return info;
892 };
893
894 // clang-format off
895 ExtensionInfoMap map;
896 map["GL_OES_element_index_uint"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::elementIndexUintOES);
897 map["GL_OES_packed_depth_stencil"] = esOnlyExtension(&Extensions::packedDepthStencilOES);
898 map["GL_OES_get_program_binary"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::getProgramBinaryOES);
899 map["GL_OES_rgb8_rgba8"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::rgb8rgba8OES);
900 map["GL_NV_read_depth"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::readDepthNV);
901 map["GL_NV_read_stencil"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::readStencilNV);
902 map["GL_NV_depth_buffer_float2"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::depthBufferFloat2NV);
903 map["GL_EXT_texture_format_BGRA8888"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureFormatBGRA8888);
904 map["GL_EXT_texture_type_2_10_10_10_REV"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureFormat2101010REV);
905 map["GL_EXT_read_format_bgra"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::readFormatBGRA);
906 map["GL_NV_pixel_buffer_object"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::pixelBufferObjectNV);
907 map["GL_ARB_sync"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::glSyncARB);
908 map["GL_OES_mapbuffer"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::mapBufferOES);
909 map["GL_EXT_map_buffer_range"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::mapBufferRange);
910 map["GL_EXT_color_buffer_half_float"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::colorBufferHalfFloat);
911 map["GL_OES_texture_half_float"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureHalfFloat);
912 map["GL_OES_texture_half_float_linear"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureHalfFloatLinear);
913 map["GL_OES_texture_float"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureFloatOES);
914 map["GL_OES_texture_float_linear"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureFloatLinearOES);
915 map["GL_EXT_texture_rg"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureRG);
916 map["GL_EXT_texture_compression_dxt1"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionDXT1);
917 map["GL_ANGLE_texture_compression_dxt3"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionDXT3);
918 map["GL_ANGLE_texture_compression_dxt5"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionDXT5);
919 map["GL_EXT_texture_compression_s3tc_srgb"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionS3TCsRGB);
920 map["GL_KHR_texture_compression_astc_ldr"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionASTCLDRKHR);
921 map["GL_KHR_texture_compression_astc_hdr"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionASTCHDRKHR);
922 map["GL_KHR_texture_compression_astc_sliced_3d"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionSliced3dASTCKHR);
923 map["GL_OES_texture_compression_astc"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionASTCOES);
924 map["GL_EXT_texture_compression_bptc"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionBPTC);
925 map["GL_EXT_texture_compression_rgtc"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCompressionRGTC);
926 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC1_RGB8_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC1RGB8TextureOES);
927 map["GL_EXT_compressed_ETC1_RGB8_sub_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC1RGB8SubTexture);
928 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC2_RGB8_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC2RGB8TextureOES);
929 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC2_sRGB8_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC2sRGB8TextureOES);
930 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC2_punchthroughA_RGBA8_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC2PunchthroughARGB8TextureOES);
931 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC2_punchthroughA_sRGB8_alpha_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC2PunchthroughAsRGB8AlphaTextureOES);
932 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC2_RGBA8_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC2RGBA8TextureOES);
933 map["GL_OES_compressed_ETC2_sRGB8_alpha8_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedETC2sRGB8Alpha8TextureOES);
934 map["GL_OES_compressed_EAC_R11_unsigned_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedEACR11UnsignedTextureOES);
935 map["GL_OES_compressed_EAC_R11_signed_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedEACR11SignedTextureOES);
936 map["GL_OES_compressed_EAC_RG11_unsigned_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::compressedEACRG11UnsignedTextureOES);

1038 map["GL_ANGLE_base_vertex_base_instance"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::baseVertexBaseInstance);
1039 map["GL_ANGLE_get_image"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::getImageANGLE);
1040 map["GL_OES_draw_elements_base_vertex"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::drawElementsBaseVertexOES);
1041 map["GL_EXT_draw_elements_base_vertex"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::drawElementsBaseVertexEXT);
1042 map["GL_EXT_gpu_shader5"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::gpuShader5EXT);
1043 map["GL_APPLE_clip_distance"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::clipDistanceAPPLE);
1044 map["GL_EXT_EGL_image_array"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::eglImageArray);
1045 map["GL_EXT_buffer_storage"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::bufferStorageEXT);
1046 map["GL_EXT_external_buffer"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::externalBufferEXT);
1047 map["GL_OES_texture_stencil8"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::stencilIndex8);
1048 map["GL_OES_sample_shading"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::sampleShadingOES);
1049 map["GL_OES_shader_multisample_interpolation"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::multisampleInterpolationOES);
1050 map["GL_OES_shader_image_atomic"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::shaderImageAtomicOES);
1051 map["GL_NV_robustness_video_memory_purge"] = esOnlyExtension(&Extensions::robustnessVideoMemoryPurgeNV);
1052 map["GL_ANGLE_get_tex_level_parameter"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::getTexLevelParameterANGLE);
1053 map["GL_EXT_copy_image"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::copyImageEXT);
1054 map["GL_OES_texture_buffer"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureBufferOES);
1055 map["GL_EXT_texture_buffer"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureBufferEXT);
1056 // GLES1 extensions
1057 map["GL_OES_point_size_array"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::pointSizeArrayOES);
1058 map["GL_OES_texture_cube_map"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCubeMapOES);
1059 map["GL_OES_point_sprite"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::pointSpriteOES);
1060 map["GL_OES_draw_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::drawTextureOES);
1061 map["GL_ANGLE_memory_size"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::memorySize);
1062 map["GL_EXT_shader_non_constant_global_initializers"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::shaderNonConstGlobalInitializersEXT);
1063 map["GL_WEBGL_video_texture"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::webglVideoTexture);
1064 map["GL_OES_texture_cube_map_array"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCubeMapArrayOES);
1065 map["GL_EXT_texture_cube_map_array"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::textureCubeMapArrayEXT);
1066 map["GL_EXT_shadow_samplers"] = enableableExtension(&Extensions::shadowSamplersEXT);
1067 // clang-format on
1068
1069#if defined(ANGLE_ENABLE_ASSERTS)
1070 // Verify all extension strings start with GL_
1071 for (const auto &extension : map)
1072 {
1073 ASSERT(extension.first.rfind("GL_", 0) == 0);
1074 }
1075#endif
1076
1077 return map;
1078 };
1079
1080 static const angle::base::NoDestructor<ExtensionInfoMap> extensionInfo(buildExtensionInfoMap());
1081 return *extensionInfo;
1082}
1083
1084TypePrecision::TypePrecision() = default;
1085
1086TypePrecision::TypePrecision(const TypePrecision &other) = default;
1087
1088TypePrecision &TypePrecision::operator=(const TypePrecision &other) = default;
1089
1090void TypePrecision::setIEEEFloat()
1091{
1092 range = {{127, 127}};
1093 precision = 23;
1094}
1095
1096void TypePrecision::setTwosComplementInt(unsigned int bits)
1097{
1098 range = {{static_cast<GLint>(bits) - 1, static_cast<GLint>(bits) - 2}};
1099 precision = 0;
1100}
1101
1102void TypePrecision::setSimulatedFloat(unsigned int r, unsigned int p)
1103{
1104 range = {{static_cast<GLint>(r), static_cast<GLint>(r)}};
1105 precision = static_cast<GLint>(p);
1106}
1107
1108void TypePrecision::setSimulatedInt(unsigned int r)
1109{
1110 range = {{static_cast<GLint>(r), static_cast<GLint>(r)}};
1111 precision = 0;
1112}
1113
1114void TypePrecision::get(GLint *returnRange, GLint *returnPrecision) const
1115{
1116 std::copy(range.begin(), range.end(), returnRange);
1117 *returnPrecision = precision;
1118}
1119
1120Caps::Caps() = default;
1121Caps::Caps(const Caps &other) = default;
1122Caps::~Caps() = default;
1123
1124Caps GenerateMinimumCaps(const Version &clientVersion, const Extensions &extensions)
1125{
1126 Caps caps;
1127
1128 // GLES1 emulation (Minimums taken from Table 6.20 / 6.22 (ES 1.1 spec))
1129 if (clientVersion < Version(2, 0))
1130 {
1131 caps.maxMultitextureUnits = 2;
1132 caps.maxLights = 8;
1133 caps.maxClipPlanes = 1;
1134
1135 caps.maxModelviewMatrixStackDepth = 16;
1136 caps.maxProjectionMatrixStackDepth = 2;
1137 caps.maxTextureMatrixStackDepth = 2;
1138
1139 caps.minSmoothPointSize = 1.0f;
1140 caps.maxSmoothPointSize = 1.0f;
1141 }
1142
1143 if (clientVersion >= Version(2, 0))
1144 {
1145 // Table 6.18
1146 caps.max2DTextureSize = 64;
1147 caps.maxCubeMapTextureSize = 16;
1148 caps.maxViewportWidth = caps.max2DTextureSize;
1149 caps.maxViewportHeight = caps.max2DTextureSize;
1150 caps.minAliasedPointSize = 1;
1151 caps.maxAliasedPointSize = 1;
1152 caps.minAliasedLineWidth = 1;
1153 caps.maxAliasedLineWidth = 1;
1154
1155 // Table 6.19
1156 caps.vertexHighpFloat.setSimulatedFloat(62, 16);
1157 caps.vertexMediumpFloat.setSimulatedFloat(14, 10);
1158 caps.vertexLowpFloat.setSimulatedFloat(1, 8);
1159 caps.vertexHighpInt.setSimulatedInt(16);
1160 caps.vertexMediumpInt.setSimulatedInt(10);
1161 caps.vertexLowpInt.setSimulatedInt(8);
1162 caps.fragmentHighpFloat.setSimulatedFloat(62, 16);
1163 caps.fragmentMediumpFloat.setSimulatedFloat(14, 10);
1164 caps.fragmentLowpFloat.setSimulatedFloat(1, 8);
1165 caps.fragmentHighpInt.setSimulatedInt(16);
1166 caps.fragmentMediumpInt.setSimulatedInt(10);
1167 caps.fragmentLowpInt.setSimulatedInt(8);
1168
1169 // Table 6.20
1170 caps.maxVertexAttributes = 8;
1171 caps.maxVertexUniformVectors = 128;
1172 caps.maxVaryingVectors = 8;
1173 caps.maxCombinedTextureImageUnits = 8;
1174 caps.maxShaderTextureImageUnits[ShaderType::Fragment] = 8;
1175 caps.maxFragmentUniformVectors = 16;
1176 caps.maxRenderbufferSize = 1;
1177
1178 // Table 3.35
1179 caps.maxSamples = 4;
1180 }
1181
1182 if (clientVersion >= Version(3, 0))
1183 {
1184 // Table 6.28
1185 caps.maxElementIndex = (1 << 24) - 1;
1186 caps.max3DTextureSize = 256;
1187 caps.max2DTextureSize = 2048;
1188 caps.maxArrayTextureLayers = 256;
1189 caps.maxLODBias = 2.0f;
1190 caps.maxCubeMapTextureSize = 2048;
1191 caps.maxRenderbufferSize = 2048;
1192 caps.maxDrawBuffers = 4;
1193 caps.maxColorAttachments = 4;
1194 caps.maxViewportWidth = caps.max2DTextureSize;
1195 caps.maxViewportHeight = caps.max2DTextureSize;
1196
1197 // Table 6.29
1198 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_R11_EAC);
1199 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_SIGNED_R11_EAC);
1200 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_RG11_EAC);
1201 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_SIGNED_RG11_EAC);
1202 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_RGB8_ETC2);
1203 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ETC2);
1204 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_RGB8_PUNCHTHROUGH_ALPHA1_ETC2);
1205 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_PUNCHTHROUGH_ALPHA1_ETC2);
1206 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA8_ETC2_EAC);
1207 caps.compressedTextureFormats.push_back(GL_COMPRESSED_SRGB8_ALPHA8_ETC2_EAC);
1208 caps.vertexHighpFloat.setIEEEFloat();
1209 caps.vertexHighpInt.setTwosComplementInt(32);
1210 caps.vertexMediumpInt.setTwosComplementInt(16);
1211 caps.vertexLowpInt.setTwosComplementInt(8);
1212 caps.fragmentHighpFloat.setIEEEFloat();
1213 caps.fragmentHighpInt.setSimulatedInt(32);
1214 caps.fragmentMediumpInt.setTwosComplementInt(16);
1215 caps.fragmentLowpInt.setTwosComplementInt(8);
1216 caps.maxServerWaitTimeout = 0;
1217
1218 // Table 6.31
1219 caps.maxVertexAttributes = 16;
1220 caps.maxShaderUniformComponents[ShaderType::Vertex] = 1024;
1221 caps.maxVertexUniformVectors = 256;
1222 caps.maxShaderUniformBlocks[ShaderType::Vertex] = limits::kMinimumShaderUniformBlocks;
1223 caps.maxVertexOutputComponents = limits::kMinimumVertexOutputComponents;
1224 caps.maxShaderTextureImageUnits[ShaderType::Vertex] = 16;
1225
1226 // Table 6.32
1227 caps.maxShaderUniformComponents[ShaderType::Fragment] = 896;
1228 caps.maxFragmentUniformVectors = 224;
1229 caps.maxShaderUniformBlocks[ShaderType::Fragment] = limits::kMinimumShaderUniformBlocks;
1230 caps.maxFragmentInputComponents = 60;
1231 caps.maxShaderTextureImageUnits[ShaderType::Fragment] = 16;
1232 caps.minProgramTexelOffset = -8;
1233 caps.maxProgramTexelOffset = 7;
1234
1235 // Table 6.33
1236 caps.maxUniformBufferBindings = 24;
1237 caps.maxUniformBlockSize = 16384;
1238 caps.uniformBufferOffsetAlignment = 256;
1239 caps.maxCombinedUniformBlocks = 24;
1240 caps.maxVaryingComponents = 60;
1241 caps.maxVaryingVectors = 15;
1242 caps.maxCombinedTextureImageUnits = 32;
1243
1244 // Table 6.34
1245 caps.maxTransformFeedbackInterleavedComponents = 64;
1246 caps.maxTransformFeedbackSeparateAttributes = 4;
1247 caps.maxTransformFeedbackSeparateComponents = 4;
1248 }
1249
1250 if (clientVersion >= Version(3, 1))
1251 {
1252 // Table 20.40
1253 caps.maxFramebufferWidth = 2048;
1254 caps.maxFramebufferHeight = 2048;
1255 caps.maxFramebufferSamples = 4;
1256 caps.maxSampleMaskWords = 1;
1257 caps.maxColorTextureSamples = 1;
1258 caps.maxDepthTextureSamples = 1;
1259 caps.maxIntegerSamples = 1;
1260
1261 // Table 20.41
1262 caps.maxVertexAttribRelativeOffset = 2047;
1263 caps.maxVertexAttribBindings = 16;
1264 caps.maxVertexAttribStride = 2048;
1265
1266 // Table 20.43
1267 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounterBuffers[ShaderType::Vertex] = 0;
1268 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounters[ShaderType::Vertex] = 0;
1269 caps.maxShaderImageUniforms[ShaderType::Vertex] = 0;
1270 caps.maxShaderStorageBlocks[ShaderType::Vertex] = 0;
1271
1272 // Table 20.44
1273 caps.maxShaderUniformComponents[ShaderType::Fragment] = 1024;
1274 caps.maxFragmentUniformVectors = 256;
1275 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounterBuffers[ShaderType::Fragment] = 0;
1276 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounters[ShaderType::Fragment] = 0;
1277 caps.maxShaderImageUniforms[ShaderType::Fragment] = 0;
1278 caps.maxShaderStorageBlocks[ShaderType::Fragment] = 0;
1279 caps.minProgramTextureGatherOffset = 0;
1280 caps.maxProgramTextureGatherOffset = 0;
1281
1282 // Table 20.45
1283 caps.maxComputeWorkGroupCount = {{65535, 65535, 65535}};
1284 caps.maxComputeWorkGroupSize = {{128, 128, 64}};
1285 caps.maxComputeWorkGroupInvocations = 12;
1286 caps.maxShaderUniformBlocks[ShaderType::Compute] = limits::kMinimumShaderUniformBlocks;
1287 caps.maxShaderTextureImageUnits[ShaderType::Compute] = 16;
1288 caps.maxComputeSharedMemorySize = 16384;
1289 caps.maxShaderUniformComponents[ShaderType::Compute] = 1024;
1290 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounterBuffers[ShaderType::Compute] = 1;
1291 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounters[ShaderType::Compute] = 8;
1292 caps.maxShaderImageUniforms[ShaderType::Compute] = 4;
1293 caps.maxShaderStorageBlocks[ShaderType::Compute] = 4;
1294
1295 // Table 20.46
1296 caps.maxUniformBufferBindings = 36;
1297 caps.maxCombinedTextureImageUnits = 48;
1298 caps.maxCombinedShaderOutputResources = 4;
1299
1300 // Table 20.47
1301 caps.maxUniformLocations = 1024;
1302 caps.maxAtomicCounterBufferBindings = 1;
1303 caps.maxAtomicCounterBufferSize = 32;
1304 caps.maxCombinedAtomicCounterBuffers = 1;
1305 caps.maxCombinedAtomicCounters = 8;
1306 caps.maxImageUnits = 4;
1307 caps.maxCombinedImageUniforms = 4;
1308 caps.maxShaderStorageBufferBindings = 4;
1309 caps.maxShaderStorageBlockSize = 1 << 27;
1310 caps.maxCombinedShaderStorageBlocks = 4;
1311 caps.shaderStorageBufferOffsetAlignment = 256;
1312 }
1313
1314 if (extensions.textureRectangle)
1315 {
1316 caps.maxRectangleTextureSize = 64;
1317 }
1318
1319 if (extensions.geometryShader)
1320 {
1321 // Table 20.40 (GL_EXT_geometry_shader)
1322 caps.maxFramebufferLayers = 256;
1323 caps.layerProvokingVertex = GL_LAST_VERTEX_CONVENTION_EXT;
1324
1325 // Table 20.43gs (GL_EXT_geometry_shader)
1326 caps.maxShaderUniformComponents[ShaderType::Geometry] = 1024;
1327 caps.maxShaderUniformBlocks[ShaderType::Geometry] = limits::kMinimumShaderUniformBlocks;
1328 caps.maxGeometryInputComponents = 64;
1329 caps.maxGeometryOutputComponents = 64;
1330 caps.maxGeometryOutputVertices = 256;
1331 caps.maxGeometryTotalOutputComponents = 1024;
1332 caps.maxShaderTextureImageUnits[ShaderType::Geometry] = 16;
1333 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounterBuffers[ShaderType::Geometry] = 0;
1334 caps.maxShaderAtomicCounters[ShaderType::Geometry] = 0;
1335 caps.maxShaderStorageBlocks[ShaderType::Geometry] = 0;
1336 caps.maxGeometryShaderInvocations = 32;
1337
1338 // Table 20.46 (GL_EXT_geometry_shader)
1339 caps.maxShaderImageUniforms[ShaderType::Geometry] = 0;
1340
1341 // Table 20.46 (GL_EXT_geometry_shader)
1342 caps.maxUniformBufferBindings = 48;
1343 caps.maxCombinedUniformBlocks = 36;
1344 caps.maxCombinedTextureImageUnits = 64;
1345 }
1346
1347 for (ShaderType shaderType : AllShaderTypes())
1348 {
1349 caps.maxCombinedShaderUniformComponents[shaderType] =
1350 caps.maxShaderUniformBlocks[shaderType] *
1351 static_cast<GLuint>(caps.maxUniformBlockSize / 4) +
1352 caps.maxShaderUniformComponents[shaderType];
1353 }
1354
1355 return caps;
1356}
1357} // namespace gl

1464ClientExtensions::ClientExtensions() = default;
1465ClientExtensions::ClientExtensions(const ClientExtensions &other) = default;
1466
1467std::vector<std::string> ClientExtensions::getStrings() const
1468{
1469 std::vector<std::string> extensionStrings;
1470
1471 // clang-format off
1472 // | Extension name | Supported flag | Output vector |
1473 InsertExtensionString("EGL_EXT_client_extensions", clientExtensions, &extensionStrings);
1474 InsertExtensionString("EGL_EXT_platform_base", platformBase, &extensionStrings);
1475 InsertExtensionString("EGL_EXT_platform_device", platformDevice, &extensionStrings);
1476 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle", platformANGLE, &extensionStrings);
1477 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_d3d", platformANGLED3D, &extensionStrings);
1478 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_d3d11on12", platformANGLED3D11ON12, &extensionStrings);
1479 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_device_type_egl_angle", platformANGLEDeviceTypeEGLANGLE, &extensionStrings);
1480 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_device_type_swiftshader", platformANGLEDeviceTypeSwiftShader, &extensionStrings);
1481 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_opengl", platformANGLEOpenGL, &extensionStrings);
1482 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_null", platformANGLENULL, &extensionStrings);
1483 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_vulkan", platformANGLEVulkan, &extensionStrings);
1484 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_metal", platformANGLEMetal, &extensionStrings);
1485 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_angle_context_virtualization", platformANGLEContextVirtualization, &extensionStrings);
1486 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_device_context_volatile_eagl", platformANGLEDeviceContextVolatileEagl, &extensionStrings);
1487 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_platform_device_context_volatile_cgl", platformANGLEDeviceContextVolatileCgl, &extensionStrings);
1488 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_device_creation", deviceCreation, &extensionStrings);
1489 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_device_creation_d3d11", deviceCreationD3D11, &extensionStrings);
1490 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_x11_visual", x11Visual, &extensionStrings);
1491 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_experimental_present_path", experimentalPresentPath, &extensionStrings);
1492 InsertExtensionString("EGL_KHR_client_get_all_proc_addresses", clientGetAllProcAddresses, &extensionStrings);
1493 InsertExtensionString("EGL_KHR_debug", debug, &extensionStrings);
1494 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_explicit_context", explicitContext, &extensionStrings);
1495 InsertExtensionString("EGL_ANGLE_feature_control", featureControlANGLE, &extensionStrings);
1496 // clang-format on
1497
1498 return extensionStrings;
1499}
1500
1501} // namespace egl
